This game needs two things to happen which will fix the problems that everyone is having objectively in the game. First, you need to calm down with the dlc operators and issue a nerf to several of the over done releases...*cough*cough "Doctor". There are several other characters that I feel are in good need of NERFS with very few who need minor buffs *cough *cough "Wraith". Second, you need to address the constant looping that is allowed for the survivors with very little that the killer can do about it but run away and have done nothing but waste their time. I think there needs to be a change that can allow for the killer to pursue looping survivors at an increasing rate where the longer the chase goes the faster and faster the killer gets. This will bode well to enforcing the idea that the survivors should have to work together in order to loop successfully and not just outrun the killer with a single survivor who cana abuse unbalanced and poorly placed windows/pallets without any lashback.... and then you wonder why killers become toxic....thus escalating the cycle of madness that is creating all the toxicity and is killing the game. The devs need to do some balancing or else this game is going to lose the essence of what it once was and still could be.
